converse.line: Welcome, Emere! What can I get you?

choice.line: What do you sell on this side?

I've got everything you need on a day to day basis. I have food, water, clothes, and books, all available at the lowest price. I also sell fun things like board games and trading cards, as well as miscellaneous items. Take a look around, I guarantee if it's something general, Kenji has it.
He doesn't have any of the latest technology, though.
Of course I don't. That's your specialty. Stop trying to steal my customers.
Why not just have one store?
The plan was to have one store, but somebody (cough-cough Arlo cough) thought it would be better to split it into two.
Hey, I don't think that's the reason. I thought we agreed that we're both very competitive and have slightly different interests. So working together to run it as one store would be a train wreck.
I think you guys made the right choice.
Everything is always a discounted price. However, we've got a 50% off sale on all fruits. It's becoming winter soon and we need to sell all of it.
I've got some laptops on sale on my side.
Hey, I'm just trying to make a living here.

converse.line: Do you have any trading cards for sale?
#5.00 for a pack of 3. You looking to buy some?
...I never knew you were the type to collect trading cards. Especially Gokuman ones.
Oh. It's not for me. I guess you could call it a gift.
I'd like a bottle of spring water, please.
You got it. That will be #0.5.
